title: Bug 117981: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description: Description: Any item cannot be selected at the first attempt in the library outline view.
OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the item is not being selected.
EB: The expected behavior is that any item in the library outline view can be selected on the first attempt.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Add a label in a library file.
2. Select the label item in the library outline view.
